Texts.Chs: 把1份^orange;中子素和反中子素^reset;带给^red;凯文^reset;
我可真是$%^&#%了@#$@%@，你居然做到了。我猜你还没有我想象中的那么笨。作为回报，我会把这个超级牛逼的科技蓝图交给你，这可是我在^orange;反异界^reset;找到的！不，我不会告诉你那是哪里。只有格雷格，我自己，以及我在参宿七 IV的一个朋友知道那个地方，而你不能知道，因为你不像^cyan;戴夫^reset;那样特殊。
Texts.Eng: Holy....$%^&#%ing @#$@%@ you did it. I guess you aren't the dumbass I had assumed. In return, I give you this super-neat technology blueprint I found lying around in the ^orange;Anti-Realm^reset;! No, I won't tell you where that is. It's known only to Gregs, myself, and a fried wonton located on Rigel IV. You can't know, because you aren't special like ^cyan;The Dave^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 想要尝试一些^orange;超级有趣^reset;的事情吗？让我们创造一些过去被认为是^green;虚构^reset;的东西——创造一些^orange;中子素^reset;和^orange;反中子素^reset;吧！如果你能做到，我就会交给你一些真的很不可思议的东西。我保证，这一次是真的。
Texts.Eng: Wanna try something ^orange;super fun^reset;? Let's create something previously thought to be ^green;hypotehtical^reset;! Let's try making ^orange;Neutronium^reset; and ^orange;Anti-Neutronium^reset;! I'll give you something ^red;truly amazing^reset; if you can do it! I promise. For real, this time.
